base_analysis.recommendation:
Implement a Content Security Policy (CSP) to restrict the sources of executable content. A strong CSP can effectively mitigate XSS attacks by preventing the execution of malicious scripts.

Add the X-XSS-Protection header with a value of '1; mode=block' to enable the browser's built-in XSS protection mechanisms.

Include the X-Content-Type-Options header with a value of 'nosniff' to prevent browsers from interpreting files as a different MIME type than declared.
